reviewText: Can't get enough Die Hard,
You can't go wrong with Bruce Willis if you're looking for action adventure. He delivers  everytime. Constantly edge of your seat.
Fast Shipping, nice to have all on 2 disks.  Watched them all day during a snow storm.  Wish there were more like this available.
Been looking for a collection of these movies, so happy to find 4 Die Hard movies together, for a great price.
A great set of movies to get the husband.  Have 2 t.v's set him up with the collection in one room and watch chick flicks in the other.

You cannot beat Bruce Willis for action movies. He always plays the "average guy" who goes way beyond extraordinary to save the day. The action is always non-stop and the characters have laughing and crying and sitting on the edge of your seat. I love his movies!
The movies came right on time for my Aunts birthday. 5 star

Great collection of Bruce Willis
Die Hard

Loved it! Great deal getting 4 in a pack! I always wanted this set because as Christmas present to myself. And Classic Bruce Willis at his best!
Came in on time, and described by seller exactly of product status.  Happy, happy, HAPPY!
